name: Air Fryer Chipotle Fish Sandwiches
description: Crispy angelfish goujons stuffed in warm buns with mild chipotle sauce, slaw, and pickles. Fast, family-friendly, and air-fryer first.
prep_steps: Preheat air fryer to 200°C/390°F for 3 minutes.
Slice pickles if whole; separate 4 lettuce leaves.
Stir slaw to loosen; set out hamburger buns.
Place chipotle sauce in a small bowl with a spoon for spreading.
Line air fryer basket with a perforated liner or lightly oil the basket if needed.
cook_steps: Add angelfish goujons to the air fryer basket in a single layer.
Air fry for 8–10 minutes, shaking or turning halfway, until golden and hot throughout.
Microwave hamburger buns for 10–15 seconds to soften.
Split buns and spread chipotle sauce on the cut sides.
Layer lettuce on the bottom bun, add goujons, top with slaw and pickles.

ingredients.preparation: air fry from chilled or frozen per pack timing; cook until crisp
